S04sukhvysu:1: evaṃ mayā śrutaṃ / ekasmin samaye bhagavāñ śrāvastyāṃ viharati
S04sukhvysu:4: bhikṣuśatair abhijñānābhijñātaiḥ sthavirair mahāśrāvakaiḥ sarvair arhadbhiḥ /
S04sukhvysu:5: tadyathā sthavireṇa ca śāriputreṇa mahāmaudgalyāyanena ca mahākāśyapena
S04sukhvysu:6: ca mahākapphiṇena ca mahākātyāyanena ca mahākauṣṭhilena
S04sukhvysu:7: ca revatena ca śuddhipaṃthakena ca naṃdena cānaṃdena ca rāhulena ca
S04sukhvysu:8: gavāṃpatinā ca bharadvājena ca kālodayinā ca vakkulena cāniruddhena
S04sukhvysu:9: ca / etaiś cānyaiś ca saṃbahulair mahāśrāvakaiḥ saṃbahulaiś ca bodhisattvair
S04sukhvysu:10: mahāsattvaiḥ / tadyathā maṃjuśriyā ca kumārabhūtenājitena ca
S04sukhvysu:11: bodhisattvena gaṃdhahastinā ca bodhisattvena nityodyuktena ca
S04sukhvysu:13: ca bodhisattvena / etaiś cānyaiś ca saṃbahulair bodhisattvair
S04sukhvysu:14: mahāsattvaiḥ / śakreṇa ca devānām iṃdreṇa brahmaṇā ca sahāṃpatinā /
S04sukhvysu:17: tatra khalu bhagavān āyuṣmaṃtaṃ śāriputram āmaṃtrayati sma / asti
S04sukhvysu:18: śāriputra paścime digbhāga ito buddhakṣetraṃ koṭiśatasahasraṃ buddhakṣetrāṇām
S04sukhvysu:19: atikramya sukhāvatī nāma lokadhātuḥ / tatrāmitāyurnāma tathāgato
S04sukhvysu:20: 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha etarhi tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati dharmaṃ ca
S04sukhvysu:21: deśayati / tat kiṃ manyase śāriputra kena kāraṇena sā lokadhātuḥ
S04sukhvysu:22: sukhāvatīty ucyate / tatra khalu punaḥ śāriputra sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau
S04sukhvysu:23: nāsti sattvānāṃ kāyaduḥkhaṃ na cittaduḥkhaṃ apramāṇāny eva sukhakāraṇāni /
S04sukhvysu:24: tena kāraṇena sā lokadhātuḥ sukhāvatīty ucyate //2//
S04sukhvysu:25: punar aparaṃ śāriputra sukhāvatī lokadhātuḥ saptabhir vedikābhiḥ
S04sukhvysu:26: saptabhis tālapaṃktibhiḥ kiṃkiṇījālaiś ca samalaṃkṛtā samaṃtato 'nuparikṣiptā
S04sukhvysu:27: citrā darśanīyā caturṇāṃ ratnānāṃ / tadyathā suvarṇasya
S04sukhvysu:28: rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya sphaṭikasya / evaṃrūpaiḥ śāriputra buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaiḥ
S04sukhvysu:30: punar aparaṃ śāriputra sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau saptaratnamayyaḥ puṣkariṇyaḥ /
S04sukhvysu:31: tadyathā suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya sphaṭikasya lohita-
S04sukhvysu:34: tāsu ca puṣkariṇīṣu samaṃtāc caturdiśaṃ catvāri sopānāni citrāṇi
S04sukhvysu:35: darśanīyāni caturṇāṃ ratnānāṃ / tadyathā suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya
S04sukhvysu:36: sphaṭikasya / tāsāṃ ca puṣkariṇīnāṃ samaṃtād ratnavṛkṣā jātāś citrā
S04sukhvysu:37: darśanīyā saptānāṃ ratnānāṃ / tadyathā suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya
S04sukhvysu:40: ratnasya / tāsu ca puṣkariṇīṣu saṃti padmāni jātāni nīlāni
S04sukhvysu:48: punar aparaṃ śāriputra tatra buddhakṣetre nityapravāditāni divyāni
S04sukhvysu:49: tūryāṇi suvarṇavarṇā ca mahāpṛthivī ramaṇīyā / tatra ca buddhakṣetre
S04sukhvysu:50: triṣkṛtvo rātrau triṣkṛtvo divasasya puṣpavarṣaṃ pravarṣati divyānāṃ
S04sukhvysu:51: māṃdāravapuṣpāṇāṃ / tatra ye sattvā upapannās ta ekena purobhaktena
S04sukhvysu:52: koṭiśatasahasraṃ buddhānāṃ vaṃdaṃty anyāṃl lokadhātūn gatvā / ekaikaṃ ca
S04sukhvysu:53: tathāgataṃ koṭiśatasahasrābhiḥ puṣpavṛṣṭibhir abhyavakīrya punar api
S04sukhvysu:54: tām eva lokadhātum āgacchaṃti divāvihārāya / evaṃrūpaiḥ śāriputra
S04sukhvysu:56: punar aparaṃ śāriputra tatra buddhakṣetre saṃti haṃsāḥ kraiṃcā mayūrāś ca /
S04sukhvysu:57: te triṣkṛtvo rātrau triṣkṛtvo divasasya saṃnipatya saṃgītiṃ kurvaṃti
S04sukhvysu:58: sma svakasvakāni ca rutāni pravyāharaṃti / teṣāṃ pravyāharatām
S04sukhvysu:59: iṃdriyabalabodhyaṃgaśabdo niścarati / tatra teṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ taṃ śabdaṃ
S04sukhvysu:60: śrutvā buddhamanasikāra utpadyate dharmamanasikāra utpadyate saṃghamanasikāra
S04sukhvysu:61: utpadyate // tat kiṃ manyase śāriputra tiryagyonigatās te
S04sukhvysu:63: sattvāḥ / na punar evaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ / tat kasmād dhetoḥ / nāmāpi śāriputra
S04sukhvysu:64: tatra buddhakṣetre nirayāṇāṃ nāsti tiryagyonīnāṃ yamalokasya
S04sukhvysu:65: nāsti / te punaḥ pakṣisaṃghās tenāmitāyuṣā tathāgatena nirmitā
S04sukhvysu:68: punar aparaṃ śāriputra tatra buddhakṣetre tāsāṃ ca tālapaṃktīnāṃ teṣāṃ ca
S04sukhvysu:69: kiṃkiṇījālānāṃ vāteritānāṃ valgur manojñaḥ śabdo niścarati /
S04sukhvysu:70: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra koṭiśatasahasrāṃgikasya divyasya tūryasya
S04sukhvysu:71: cāryaiḥ(2) saṃpravāditasya valgur manojñaḥ śabdo niścarati evam eva
S04sukhvysu:72: śāriputra tāsāṃ ca tālapaṃktīnāṃ teṣāṃ ca kiṃkiṇījālānāṃ
S04sukhvysu:73: vāteritānāṃ valgur manojñaḥ śabdo niścarati / tatra teṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ
S04sukhvysu:74: taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā buddhānusmṛtiḥ kāye saṃtiṣṭhati dharmānusmṛtiḥ kāye
S04sukhvysu:75: saṃtiṣṭhati saṃghānusmṛtiḥ kāye saṃtiṣṭhati / evaṃrūpaiḥ śāriputra
S04sukhvysu:77: tat kiṃ manyase śāriputra kena kāraṇena sa tathāgato 'mitāyur nāmocyate /
S04sukhvysu:78: tasya khalu punaḥ śāriputra tathāgatasya teṣāṃ ca manuṣyāṇām(3)
S04sukhvysu:79: aparimitam āyuḥpramāṇaṃ / tena kāraṇena sa tathāgato 'mitāyur nāmocyate /
S04sukhvysu:80: tasya ca śāriputra tathāgatasya daśa kalpā anuttarāṃ
S04sukhvysu:82: tat kiṃ manyase śāriputra kena kāraṇena sa tathāgato 'mitābho
S04sukhvysu:83: nāmocyate / tasya khalu punaḥ śāriputra tathāgatasyābhāpratihatā
S04sukhvysu:84: sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu / tena kāraṇena sa tathāgato 'mitābho nāmocyate //
S04sukhvysu:86: tasya ca śāriputra tathāgatasyāprameyaḥ śrāvakasaṃgho yeṣāṃ na sukaraṃ
S04sukhvysu:87: pramāṇam ākhyātuṃ śuddhānām arhatāṃ / evaṃrūpaiḥ śāriputra
S04sukhvysu:90: punar aparaṃ śāriputra ye 'mitāyuṣas tathāgatasya buddhakṣetre sattvā
S04sukhvysu:92: teṣāṃ śāriputra bodhisattvānāṃ na sukaraṃ pramāṇam ākhyātum
S04sukhvysu:94: iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchaṃti // tatra khalu punaḥ śāriputra
S04sukhvysu:95: buddhakṣetre sattvaiḥ praṇidhānaṃ kartavyaṃ / tat kasmād dhetoḥ / yatra hi nāma
S04sukhvysu:96: tathārūpaiḥ satpuruṣaiḥ saha samavadhānaṃ bhavati / nāvaramātrakeṇa
S04sukhvysu:97: śāriputra kuśalamūlenāmitāyuṣas tathāgatasya buddhakṣetre sattvā upapadyaṃte /
S04sukhvysu:98: yaḥ kaścic chāriputra kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tasya
S04sukhvysu:99: bhagavato 'mitāyuṣas tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śroṣyati śrutvā ca manasikariṣyati
S04sukhvysu:100: ekarātraṃ vā dvirātraṃ vā trirātraṃ vā catūrātraṃ vā
S04sukhvysu:101: paṃcarātraṃ vā ṣaḍrātraṃ vā saptarātraṃ vāvikṣiptacitto manasikariṣyati
S04sukhvysu:102: yadā sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā kālaṃ kariṣyati tasya kālaṃ
S04sukhvysu:104: purataḥ sthāsyati so 'viparyastacittaḥ kālaṃ kariṣyati ca(4) /
S04sukhvysu:105: sa kālaṃ krtvā tasyaivāmitāyuṣas tathāgatasya buddhakṣetre sukhāvatyāṃ
S04sukhvysu:106: lokadhātāv upapatsyate / tasmāt tarhi śāriputra idam arthavaśam saṃpaśyamāna
S04sukhvysu:107: evaṃ vadāmi satkṛtya kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā tatra buddhakṣetre
S04sukhvysu:109: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra aham etarhi tāṃ parikīrtayāmi evam eva
S04sukhvysu:111: śāriputra pūrvasyāṃ diśy akṣobhyo nāma tathāgato merudhvajo nāma
S04sukhvysu:112: tathāgato mahāmerur nāma tathāgato meruprabhāso nāma tathāgato
S04sukhvysu:113: maṃjudhvajo nāma tathāgata evaṃpramukhāḥ śāriputra pūrvasyāṃ diśi
S04sukhvysu:115: jihveṃdriyeṇa saṃcchādayitvā nirveṭhanaṃ kurvaṃti / pratīyatha yūyam idam
S04sukhvysu:118: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi caṃdrasūryapradīpo nāma tathāgato yaśaḥprabho
S04sukhvysu:119: nāma tathāgato mahārciskaṃdho nāma tathāgato merupradīpo nāma
S04sukhvysu:120: tathāgato 'naṃtavīryo nāma tathāgata evaṃpramukhāḥ śāriputra dakṣiṇasyāṃ
S04sukhvysu:122: buddhakṣetrāṇi jihveṃdriyeṇa saṃcchādayitvā nirveṭhanaṃ kurvaṃti / pratīyatha
S04sukhvysu:123: yūyam idam aciṃtyaguṇaparikīrtanaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ
S04sukhvysu:125: evaṃ paścimāyāṃ diśy amitāyur nāma tathāgato 'mitaskaṃdho nāma
S04sukhvysu:126: tathāgato 'mitadhvajo nāma tathāgato mahāprabho nāma tathāgato
S04sukhvysu:127: mahāratnaketur nāma tathāgataḥ śuddharaśmiprabho nāma tathāgata evaṃpramukhāḥ
S04sukhvysu:130: nirveṭhanaṃ kurvaṃti / pratīyatha yūyam idam aciṃtyaguṇaparikīrtanaṃ
S04sukhvysu:133: evam uttarāyāṃ diśi mahārciskaṃdho nāma tathāgato vaiśvānaranirghoṣo
S04sukhvysu:136: duṣpradharṣo nāma tathāgata ādityasaṃbhavo nāma tathāgato jaleniprabho
S04sukhvysu:137: nāma tathāgataḥ prabhākaro nāma tathāgata evaṃpramukhā(5) śāriputrottarāyāṃ
S04sukhvysu:140: pratīyatha yūyam idam aciṃtyaguṇaparikīrtanaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ nāma
S04sukhvysu:142: evam adhastāyāṃ diśi siṃho nāma tathāgato yaśo nāma tathāgato
S04sukhvysu:143: yaśaḥprabhāso nāma tathāgato dharmo nama tathāgato dharmadharo
S04sukhvysu:144: nāma tathāgato dharmadhvajo nāma tathāgata evaṃpramukhāḥ śāriputrādhastāyāṃ
S04sukhvysu:147: pratīyatha yūyam idam aciṃtyaguṇaparikīrtanaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ nāma
S04sukhvysu:149: evam upariṣṭhāyāṃ diśi brahmaghoṣo nāma tathāgato nakṣatrarājo
S04sukhvysu:150: nāma tathāgata iṃdraketudhvajarājo nāma tathāgato gaṃdhottamo nama
S04sukhvysu:151: tathāgato gaṃdhaprabhāso nāma tathāgato mahārciskaṃdho nāma tathāgato
S04sukhvysu:153: tathāgato ratnotpalaśrīr nāma tathāgataḥ sarvārthadarśo nāma tathāgataḥ
S04sukhvysu:154: sumerukalpo nāma tathāgata evaṃpramukhāḥ śāriputropariṣṭhāyāṃ diśi
S04sukhvysu:156: jihveṃdriyeṇa saṃcchādayitvā nirveṭhanaṃ kurvaṃti / pratīyatha yūyam idam
S04sukhvysu:159: tat kiṃ manyase śāriputra kena kāraṇenāyaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ sarvabuddhaparigraho
S04sukhvysu:160: nāmocyate / ye kecic chāriputra kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro
S04sukhvysu:161: vāsya dharmaparyāyasya nāmadheyaṃ śroṣyaṃti teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ
S04sukhvysu:162: nāmadheyaṃ dhārayiṣyaṃti sarve te buddhaparigṛhītā bhaviṣyaṃty avinivartanīyāś
S04sukhvysu:163: ca bhaviṣyaṃty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau(6) / tasmāt tarhi śāriputra
S04sukhvysu:164: śraddadhādhvaṃ pratīyatha mākāṃkṣayatha mama ca teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ
S04sukhvysu:165: ye kecic chāriputra kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā tasya
S04sukhvysu:167: kṛtaṃ vā kurvaṃti vā sarve te 'vinivartanīyā bhaviṣyaṃty anuttarāyāṃ
S04sukhvysu:168: samyaksaṃbodhau(6) tatra ca buddhakṣetra upapatsyaṃty upapannā vopapadyaṃti vā
S04sukhvysu:169: tasmāt tarhi śāriputra śrāddhaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś ca tatra buddhakṣetre
S04sukhvysu:171: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputrāham etarhi teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām
S04sukhvysu:173: parikīrtayāmi evam eva śāriputra mamāpi te buddhā
S04sukhvysu:174: bhagavaṃta evamaciṃtyaguṇān parikīrtayaṃti / suduṣkaraṃ bhagavatā śākyamuninā
S04sukhvysu:178: tan mamāpi śāriputra paramaduṣkaraṃ yan mayā sahāyāṃ lokadhātāv
S04sukhvysu:180: deśitaḥ sattvakaṣāye dṛṣṭikaṣāye kleśakaṣāya āyuṣkaṣāye kalpakaṣāye
S04sukhvysu:183: idam avocad bhagavān āttamanāḥ /(7) āyuṣmāñ śāriputras te ca bhikṣavas
S04sukhvysu:184: te ca bodhisattvāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuragaṃdharvaś ca loko bhagavato
